Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.CLI

Class ClientBoard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.CLI.ClientBoard
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ClientBoard extends Object implements Serializable
Class ClientBoard holds basic information about a SchoolBoard state in order to render its content through CLI and GUI interfaces. It carries information about lobby students, table students, towers coins and assistant cards.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • ClientBoard

      public ClientBoard(String owner)
      Constructor ClientBoard creates the ClientBoard instance of a selected player, whose name is given as parameter.
      Parameters:
      owner - board's owner name.

    • ClientBoard

      public ClientBoard(int towers, String owner)
      Constructor ClientBoard creates a ClientBoard instance of a selected player, whose name and towers count are given as parameter.
      Parameters:
      towers - number of towers on the board.
      owner - board's owner name.
